text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar Do you ever "man up" and take responsiblity for your actions or in this case inaction? The only thing fake is you. Please #resign & let someone competent handle #COVID19. It's sad that you feel no empathy and cannot comprehend the enormity of the pain and damage you have caused.
